entries.name: peek_result  => hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a hash that contains filename as key and coverage array as value. This is the same as `Coverage.result(stop: false, clear: false)`.

entries.name: result(stop: true, clear: true)  => hashclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a hash that contains filename as key and coverage array as value. If clear is true, it clears the counters to zero. If stop is true, it disables coverage measurement.

entries.name: running?  => boolclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if coverage stats are currently being collected (after ::start call, but before ::result call)
